title: Un p'tit beurre, des touyoux, Joe!
content:
As the French use to joke.

Happy birthday, Joe. THX 4 everything.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Joe26.gif)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Happy birthday, Joe!

Happy (early) birthday Joe! Here is some wisdom I [stole for you](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743/http:/www.toothpastefordinner.com/), use it well.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a-box-of-pens.gif)

Happy Birthday to anything but an ordinary Joe :-)

ChrisL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Joe.jpg)

Happy Birthday, Joe..  
_Alles Gute.._

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743/http:/www.formlos.net/)

grattis!:-D

/poeter

_\> Happy (early) birthday Joe!_

Those are called "time zones", Zara... :^D 9 hours early. ;^)
feliz cumple Joe!

Joyeux Anniversaire Joe!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AnniversaireJoe.png)

Happy Birthday, Joe

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/birthday1.png)

Yves, you silly bird – I know what time zones are, I just so happen to be in one! :)

jfp, that double n lig is so beautiful!

Joe was born on October, 26th, right? Coincidence? I don't think so... B-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10_26.png)
HAPPY BIRTHDAY JOE!

Here's to another year of riding safely on your new bike. ;^)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/birthdayjoe.gif)

(ps. I was also born on the 26th of another month. I like that idea.)

Happy Birthday Joe!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bday-joe2.gif)
10/26... Never saw it that way until now. So nice of you all to think of me. I've been buried at work and having a dreary (rainy) afternoon, until now. Thank you all!

(Darn, I misread the thread title. I thought this had something to do with Bit Torrent.)

Joe, I set this greeting in your favorite font ... problem is, I don't actually have it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/joep_rules.png)
For the explanation of the thread title, head to [my blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743/http:/typophile.com/node/15857).
AHAHAHAAAAHAHAHAH!
LOL. At least it didn't go to [Adobe Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Sans).

We're saving this for when Joe signs his pro deal.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jp_ambigram.png)

Yes, letters bleed too.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026021743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JPtypeninja.jpg)

Happy Birthday Joe!

We have \*almost\* the same birthday I am on the 25th!

Eben you have a Birthday:-)

ChrisL

_и с днём рождения!_

sorry i'm a bit late on this one! :^D  
hope it was great.

Better late than never...

Happy Birthday Joe!
